articles.title: 'Shame on you': Woman makes a mess while watching Dr Strange in Tampines cinema - AsiaOne
articles.description: Munching on snacks while catching a film at the cinema is normal but what's a little less customary is making a mess while doing so. Unfortunately for Catherine Ang, she saw a fellow moviegoer do just that at a screening of Marvel's latest superhero film Dr S…
articles.content:

articles.author: Agence France-Presse
articles.title: Asian Games 2022 Postponed As China Battles Its Largest Covid Outbreak - NDTV Sports
articles.description: Asian Games 2022, which were scheduled to go ahead in September this year, have been postponed, Chinese state media reported on Friday, citing the Olympic Council of Asia.
articles.content: The Asian Games due to take place in the Chinese city of Hangzhou in September have been postponed indefinitely because of Covid-19, organisers said on Friday. The Games were scheduled to be held fro… [+4098 chars]

articles.title: Top-tier sporting events on hold in countdown to China’s national congress - South China Morning Post
articles.description: Hangzhou was expected to host Asian Games in September but organisers say it will now take place next year.

articles.title: 2022 Asian Games postponed, Chinese state media reports - South China Morning Post
articles.description: Hangzhou was expected to host the Games in September, but CCTV reports that the date will change as China battles its latest Covid-19 outbreak.

articles.title: Sobbing Amber Heard testifies that Johnny Depp sexually assaulted her - cnalifestyle.channelnewsasia.com
articles.description: The actress said her ex-husband sexually assaulted her with a liquor bottle and threatened to kill her shortly after the pair were married.
